div.head: 倒生
div.div: birth of [a child in] an inverted position

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: birth of [a child in] an inverted position

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with ni chan 逆產 , delivery of [a child in] a position contrary to normal. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 2: 產難一服，橫生二服，倒生三服 , “For difficult delivery, ingest one dose. For a birth of [a child in] a transverse position ingest two doses. For a birth of [a child in] an inverted position ingest 3 doses”.
